thread.title: Future Raps on New Song: “Grab on That Pussy Like Donald”
thread.title_full: Future Raps on New Song: “Grab on That Pussy Like Donald”

author: Pitchfork
title: Future Raps on New Song: “Grab on That Pussy Like Donald”
text:
Future Raps on New Song: “Grab on That Pussy Like Donald” He references Trump’s vulgar remarks on FUTURE ’s “High Demand” Future Photo By Prince Williams/Wireimage 
Tomorrow, Future releases his new self-titled album (via Epic /A1/ Freebandz ). On one of the tracks, “High Demand,” he raps, “Let my shit go blow, this bitch come to the cypher/That type of pussy it’s gon’ make you wanna wife her.” He continues, “We do a whole lotta numbers, yeah/Grab on that pussy like Donald, yeah,” according to lyrics on Genius ; Pitchfork can confirm their accuracy. The lyric, of course, is in reference to lewd comments Trump made about women, captured in a 2005 recording that was released in the lead-up to the election. Pitchfork has reached out to Future’s representatives for comment. Artists In This Story
